title: Founded
description: Rezzels was established with a mission to create sustainable, stylish clothing.

title: First Collection
description: Launched our debut collection featuring hoodies and t-shirts.

title: Expansion
description: Added accessories and expanded our product line to include more styles.

title: Sustainability Certification
description: Achieved industry recognition for our eco-friendly manufacturing processes.

title: Global Reach
description: Expanded to international markets while maintaining our commitment to quality.
